select a.id, a.username as account, FROM_UNIXTIME(a.created_at, "%Y-%m-%d") as createTime, a.email, a.nickname, a.description as remark, a.role_id as role, r.name as roleName, a.department_id dept, d.name as deptName, a.status from sys_admin a left join sys_department d on d.id = a.department_id left join sys_role r on r.id = a.role_id where a.status != 2
AND a.username like '%${conditionMap.account}%'
AND d.id = #{conditionMap.deptId}
AND a.nickname like '%${conditionMap.nickname}%'
